objects.text: Active Noise Cancellation, Transparency Mode, Spatial Audio

product_details.description: BREATHTAKING AUDIO QUALITY — Apple-designed dynamic driver provides high-fidelity audio. Computational audio combines custom acoustic design with the Apple H1 chip and software for breakthrough listening experiences. FOCUS ON WHAT’S PLAYING — Active Noise Cancellation blocks outside noise so you can immerse yourself in music. HEAR THE WORLD AROUND YOU — Transparency mode lets you hear and interact with the world around you. PERSONALIZED SPATIAL AUDIO — With sound that suits your unique ear shape along with dynamic head tracking, AirPods Max deliver an immersive listening experience that places sound all around you. You can also listen to select songs, shows, and movies in Dolby Atmos. ACOUSTIC-FIRST DESIGN — Designed with a knit-mesh canopy and memory foam ear cushions for an exceptional over-ear fit that perfectly seals in sound. MAGICAL EXPERIENCE — Pair AirPods Max by simply placing them near your device and tapping Connect on your screen. AirPods Max pause audio when you take them off. And Automatic Switching makes listening between your iPhone, iPad, and Mac completely effortless. LONG BATTERY LIFE — Up to 20 hours of listening, movie watching, or talk time with Active Noise Cancellation and Personalized Spatial Audio enabled. PRECISION CONTROL — Use the Digital Crown to play and pause music, to answer, end, and mute yourself on calls, and to control volume and skip between tracks. A SMARTER CASE — Store in an ultra low-power state with the slim Smart Case. LEGAL DISCLAIMERS — This is a summary of the main product features. See “Additional information” to learn more. Brand - Apple ** Color - Sky Blue ** Ear Placement - Over Ear ** Form Factor - Over Ear ** Noise Control - Active Noise Cancellation **

banner_details:
This promotional banner showcases a premium audio product using a clean and modern design. At the top, the bold and futuristic heading text (`heading`) captures attention with large white typography. Just beneath it, a subheading (`subheading`) reinforces the audio quality using a softer blue tone. The center of the banner prominently features a high-resolution image of headphones (`product_image`) to visually anchor the content. Below, the description text (`description`) highlights key features in a clear serif font, followed by a prominently styled price (`price`) in bold blue hues. The call-to-action button (`cta_button`) is solid blue with dark contrasting text (`cta`), encouraging user interaction. The background uses a gradient of deep and soft blues with concentric circles and abstract curve elements, adding a sleek and futuristic touch without overpowering the foreground.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue: #0a1c3d
- Navy Gradient Start: #1e3c72 
- Navy Gradient End: #2a5298
- Accent Blue: #6e9fff
- Light Blue Text: #a9c6ff
- White: #FFFFFF
- CTA Text Dark Blue: #000b23
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and modern design, dominated by smooth gradients of blue tones. The main colors used are a soft metallic sky blue (#8FB2D9) on the ear cups, and a darker, richer navy blue (#1E3A5F) for the headband and outer accents. These hues are skillfully blended to create a minimalist yet elegant appearance, with contrasting textures highlighting the product's ergonomic and high-tech build. The mesh padding subtly transitions between light and dark blues (#A3BEDF to #425E86), adding visual depth. This stylish blend makes the product appear premium, making it ideal for advertisement banners targeting tech-savvy and design-conscious users.
